title: Michigan State vs. UCLA - First Four NCAA tournament extended highlights
author: March Madness
description:
It was a wild end to an eventful first day of the 2021 NCAA tournament as UCLA topped Michigan State in overtime. Jaime Jaquez Jr. had 27 points for the Bruins as well as a game tying and-1 in the final minute. Watch the full extended highlights here.

Watch highlights, game recaps, and much more from the 2021 NCAA Division I Men’s Basketball Tournament on the official NCAA March Madness YouTube channel. Subscribe now to be updated on the latest videos: http://www.youtube.com/marchmadness?sub_confirmation=1

localize.description:
在2021年NCAA锦标赛首日的比赛中，UCLA在加时赛中战胜了密歇根州立大学，这是一个疯狂的结局。小詹姆-贾克斯为布鲁斯队拿下27分，并在最后一分钟打出一记扳平比分的和1。在这里观看完整的扩展亮点。

localize.description:
在2021年NCAA錦標賽首日的比賽中，UCLA在加時賽中戰勝了密歇根州立大學，這是一個瘋狂的結局。小詹姆-賈克斯爲布魯斯隊拿下27分，並在最後一分鐘打出一記扳平比分的和1。在這裏觀看完整的擴展亮點。
